quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, retrieve the spherical passkey from the coffer inside the garage. And then, check that the spherical chest in the garage is unlocked with the spherical passkey. And then, make absolutely sure that the spherical chest is open. After pulling open the spherical chest, retrieve the passkey from the spherical chest within the garage. After that, put the passkey inside the coffer in the garage. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: unlock spherical chest with spherical passkey
unlock spherical chest with spherical passkey

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You are in a garage. An usual one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a spherical chest. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a spherical chest?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The spherical chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the washroom.



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundromat. An usual kind of place.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cubicle. The room is well lit.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You are in a basement. A normal one.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You're now in the pantry.



There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've moved into an usual room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be usual. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the cookhouse.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
I am so happy to announce that you are now in the restroom.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You have come into the most normal of all possible laundry places.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a kitchen.



There is an unblocked exit to the north.

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, recover the spherical passkey from the coffer within the garage. And then, make sure that the spherical chest is unlocked with the spherical passkey. After that, ensure that the spherical chest in the garage is open. And then, take the passkey from the spherical chest. Once you have taken the passkey, you can place the passkey inside the coffer within the garage. And once you've done that, you win!

main_quest.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, recover the spherical passkey from the coffer within the garage. And then, make sure that the spherical chest is unlocked with the spherical passkey. After that, ensure that the spherical chest in the garage is open. And then, take the passkey from the spherical chest. Once you have taken the passkey, you can place the passkey inside the coffer within the garage. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: unlock spherical chest with spherical passkey
